trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Bradenton
There were no other sightings in Bradenton on or around December 31st 2010
Summary: Three objects flying east to west about 4 thousand ft.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt the beginning of a friends party some of us witnessed three objects of a glowing orange color,the first two floated in close alinement with the third pulling up the rear. All three were silent moving about 80 miles per hr. The first two passed by going east to west,they kinda looked like those white chinese floating candles but you could tell they were some form of craft.The third slowed rose up and disapeared. All three objects were witnessed by 6 people in our group.
